desc.en: As it turns out, G.BIBLE only contains a simple maxim: "Love video games." Their sky-high expectations dashed, the Game Development Department, with the help of Aris, begin development on Tales Saga Chronicle 2.
desc.jp: As it turns out, G.BIBLE only contains a simple maxim: "Love video games." Their sky-high expectations dashed, the Game Development Department, with the help of Aris, begin development on Tales Saga Chronicle 2.
desc.zh_cn: 结果事与愿违，<G.Bible>的内容只是「请热爱游戏吧」这句单纯的句子。这让游戏开发部的学生们跌入失落的深渊。在爱丽丝的打气下，游戏开发部重新振作起来,着手开发<传说年代记2>。

name.en: The True Essence of Making Games
name.jp: The True Essence of Making Games

desc.en: Everyone opened the file full of joy, but was extremely disappointed by the content. Other than the well known "Love video games", none could be found.
desc.jp: Everyone opened the file full of joy, but was extremely disappointed by the content. Other than the well known "Love video games", none could be found.
desc.zh_cn: 众人满心欢喜打开了文件，但内容令人大失所望。除了众所周知的“用心做游戏”外再无其他。

desc.en: Everyone was disappointed. Aris expressed her like for TSC and wanted to make TSC2 with others. Yuzu voiced her approval, rarely.
desc.jp: Everyone was disappointed. Aris expressed her like for TSC and wanted to make TSC2 with others. Yuzu voiced her approval, rarely.
desc.zh_cn: 开发部众人感到十分沮丧。爱丽丝表达了对TSC的喜爱，因此想要与众人将TSC2制作下去。柚子本人也罕见地表达了支持。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

desc.en: Yuzu recalled the flooding negative comments in the days after the release of TSC. Her self-confidence was greatly damaged. The door was knocked at then, and initially Yuzu thought it was an angry player, but didn't expect to be Momoi and Midori. Both not only spoke highly of TSC, but would also become the members of the GDD afterwards.
desc.jp: Yuzu recalled the flooding negative comments in the days after the release of TSC. Her self-confidence was greatly damaged. The door was knocked at then, and initially Yuzu thought it was an angry player, but didn't expect to be Momoi and Midori. Both not only spoke highly of TSC, but would also become the members of the GDD afterwards.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柚子回想起了TSC发行后几天漫天的差评言论，自尊心大受损伤。这时门突然被敲想，柚子本以为是愤怒的玩家上门，却不想迎来了桃井和绿，两位不仅对TSC评价很高，而且将会成为开发部的成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柚子回想起了TSC发行后几天漫天的差评言论，自尊心大受损伤。这时门突然被敲想，柚子本以为是愤怒的玩家上门，却不想迎来了桃井和绿，两位不仅对TSC评价很高，而且将会成为开发部的成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柚子回想起了TSC发行后几天漫天的差评言论，自尊心大受损伤。这时门突然被敲想，柚子本以为是愤怒的玩家上门，却不想迎来了桃和绿，两位不仅对TSC评价很高，而且将会成为开发部的成员。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。

desc.en: Yuzu expressed her thanks to the other three. She said she was happy to make games with then being friends. Called by Momoi, everyone began their development that would last for less than a week.
desc.jp: Yuzu expressed her thanks to the other three. She said she was happy to make games with then being friends. Called by Momoi, everyone began their development that would last for less than a week.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柚子表达了对其他三人的感谢，表达了自己与伙伴一起做游戏的喜悦之情。在桃井的号召下，众人在开始了不到一周的游戏开发。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柚子表达了对其他三人的感谢，表达了自己与伙伴一起做游戏的喜悦之情。在桃井的号召下，众人在开始了不到一周的游戏开发。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柚子表达了对其他三人的感谢，表达了自己与伙伴一起做游戏的喜悦之情。在桃的号召下，众人在开始了不到一周的游戏开发。
